title.rendered: STEDI FORD RANGER PX-I & MAZDA BT50 OEM PUSH BUTTON SWITCH | DRIVING LIGHTS

content.rendered:
Ford Ranger & Mazda BT-50 OEM Replacement Push Switches that can replace the blank switches supplied in the cabin from factory for more relevant operational switches that are available in different prints depending on the attached device.

OVERVIEW

Suited to fit Ford Ranger PX-I & Mazda BT-50 models. Available in a single variant print to replace blank switches located to the right of the steering wheel in the cabin. Driving Lights print available.

OPERATION

Simple On/Off function with dash & power illumination, text lighting up whilst the vehicles dash lights are active and icon when the chosen device is currently active. Blue backlit illumination.

OEM FITMENT

Complete OEM fitment with a clean finish to maintain the factory look to the inside of the cabin. Included wire tails and diagram for quick & easy installation.

DETAILS

OEM Finish Push Button Switch designed specifically for the Ford Ranger PX (2011-2015) & Mazda BT50 (2011 to current including 2019 model). Also fits PK Ranger 2007 to 2012

KEY FEATURES

  • Blue LED Back Lighting
  • Upper Light is illuminated when Driving Lights are ON (High Beam Selected)
  • Lower Light is illuminated when Dash Lights are ON
  • Laser Etched print ensure our print will never rub off with use
  • Rated at 3A on 12v  (Must be wired through a fused relay at all time)
  • Excellent OEM matching design which replaces the factory business card holder. .

Please note this switch will not fit the current PX2 Ford Ranger.

SPECIFICATIONS

BACK LIGHT COLOUR Blue
SURFACE SIZE DIMENSIONS 39mmx23mm
RATED 3A @ 12v

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Ranger/BT-50 Type Push Button Switch | Driving Lights
  • Connector with Wire Tails
  • Wiring Diagram

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI FORD RANGER PX-I & MAZDA BT50 OEM PUSH BUTTON SWITCH | DRIVING LIGHTS

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
